106a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi go 'phang mchog /ces bya ba la mchog ni mang po'i rigs te/ mang
106b1(rgyud 'grel): por 'gyur ba'i rigs rnams so/ /gang yang gsungs pa/ dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya/ zhes pa'o/ /rab tu gnas pas na go 'phang ste/ gang gi mtshan nyid gsung ba de nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o/ /dam tshig zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ des
106b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /zhes bya ba ni mdog dang mtshan ma'i rjes so/ /lA ma zhes bya ba ni yid
106b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'ong ba reg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /gang gi bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /sring mo zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gcig pa'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa gnyis pad+ma bskor bar sbyin
106b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /yang na pad+ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ gang du ji lta de lta bar/ /langs pa 'am ni stan dag la/ /mdun du skal bzang bzhag nas ni/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya/ /myur du gnyis gnyis sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas rdo rjes rgyas gdab bya/ /ru sbal gyi phyag
106b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /ru sbal phyag rgya b+ha gar na/ /thal mo rdag dang ldan reg bya/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /so yis ma mchu btsir bar byed/ /mi thub ri dags pags pa yi/ /yang na 'jam zhing mtshan nyid bzang/ /mi thub stan du shes par bya//
106b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi blugs thod pa zhes brjod do/ /yang na spyi blugs lus su brjod/ /lag gnyis mgrin par dam 'khyud nas/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'khyud/ /ji ltar phyag rgya rtogs 'gyur ba/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o/ /
106b7(rgyud 'grel): yod na chos bcu bzhi'i gnas skabs ji ltar rnyed/ /pad+ma rnam par rgyas shing 'bar dang ldan/ /dpal ldan gang gi sems ni gang mnyam pa/ /de ni pad+ma can gyi mtshan nyid yin/ /mchu gnyis glo zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /mdung zhes bya ba ni sor
107a1(rgyud 'grel): mo gcig bstan pa'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje skyil krung gis/ /rang gi rdo rje der gnas pa'o/ /gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni dam du 'khyud nas 'o byed cing/ /byed pas bsdams pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /rab tu bskor ba byas
107a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /glang chen ma dang bde sgrub ma'o/ /bcu bzhi zhes bya ni go sla'o/ /ci nus pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //
107a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lag pa g.yon gyi brda rnams te/ zhes bya ba la/ brda rnams kyi gnyis ka'i rang bzhin/ gcig tu gyur nas ming po dang sring mo ltar shin tu gdung ba'i dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba thams cad byed do/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /dpal he ru ka zhes
107a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas gsang ba chen po ni/ /mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya/ /zhes bya ba la nga yis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang bas te/ snying rje chen po'i dbang
107a5(rgyud 'grel): gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi thabs gang gis sgrub po 'grub par 'gyur ba de nyid ni gsang ba chen po'i mtshan nyid de/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bud gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa sta go sla'o//
107a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /yan lag phyag rgya'i khyad par ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'dir gsang ba chen
107a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzhan zhes bya ba ni dam pa ste/ gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba'o/ /khyad par zhes bya ba la lag pa'i spyi las khyad par ni sor mo rnams so/ /gang gis shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o/ /dpal he ru ka
107b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sgra ji bzhin pa ste go sla'o/ /gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su/ /zhes bya ba ni stan las ldang ba'o//
107b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod ces bya ba ni dam por 'khyud dang 'o bya ba'o/ /smin ma g.yo zhes bya ba ni/ cung zad ngo tsha ba'i phyir ro/ /rnal 'gyur bskor ba zhes bya ba ni/ phul du byung ba'i bde ba sgrub pa'i don gyis bskor ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems la yongs su bskor ba ste/ srog dang rtsol ba
107b3(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis yang dag par phul du byung ba'i bde ba chen po'i lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'bar bas stong pa dbus su chud pa'i sngags pas 'jig rten gsum po dang lhan cig tu 'dra ba ste/ /sa dang chu dang rlung nyid dang/ /me dang nam mkha' nyid dang
107b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdag dang gzhan du rtag char dang/ /skad cig de la kun mi dmigs/ /de yi mod la ldog 'gyur te/ /bdag gis bde ba nyams su myong/ /zhes so/ /khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /yang na b+ha ga'i dbus chung rdo rje ni/ /shin tu stong par bsgoms pa ni/ /
107b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /ma rig la sogs glo bur ba/ /rtog pa'i nyes pa rtog las byung/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pa/ /sems ni me long bzhin du blta/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag pa nam mkha' mtshungs/ /ral gri
107b6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs gcod byed pa/ /sems can don byed rno ba'o/ /bsod nams kyis 'degs rgyal mtshan bzhin/ /mdung thung nyon mongs 'bigs byed pas/ /sems ni rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /de nyid me long rnal 'byor pas/ /kha sbyar bde ba thob pa'o/ /mtshan ma'i cha byed
107b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhes bya/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje rnams ni rgyal mtshan dang/ mdung thung rnams ji lta ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas/ rdo rje dang rgyal mtshan dang ral gri dang mdung thung ni
108a1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyi 'bru tshad tsam mo/ /'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams ni sran tsa na ka'i tshad tsam ste/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas ji lta ba bzhin/ rang rang gi mtshan ma kha dog lnga po'i nang du dkyil 'khor
108a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'khor lo chud pa la/ sems brtan pa dra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa las/ rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub yid kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
108a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang brda yi skad/ /zhes bya ba la yul sna tshogs kyi khyad par gyi skad ni brda zhes bya ba kla glo ste/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /pro taM gi zhes bya ba ni gsod por
108a4(rgyud 'grel): smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sgra ji bzhin pa nyid kyis na go sla ba ste/ gang zhig brda'i skad rnams shes pa de/ 'dir rnal 'byor pa nyid du the tshom med do/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu
108a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas don kun 'dod pa yi/ /sba bya brgyad mdza' sbyar byas te/ /zhes bya ba la brgyad kyi mdza' ni yi ge ha ste yi ge u dang thig ler bcas pa'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te bI re shA ya/ zhes bya ba
108a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid chen po'o/ /lugs 'byung
108a7(rgyud 'grel): lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi brlab pa'i rim pa las ma 'das pa'o/ /'og dang steng gi dngos grub ster/ /zhes bya ba la 'og ni sa 'og la sogs pa gang ci yod pa'o/ steng gi zhes bya ba ni steng gi dngos grub ste phyag rgya chen po'o/ /
108b1(rgyud 'grel): pho nya dang 'dra bar gyur bas na pho nya ste byang chub pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad du nges shing thams cad du gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis legs par gnas pa'i pho nya'o/ /bdag gi pho nya ma zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i mchog lhan cig tu spyod pa'o/ /kun
108b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro zhes bya ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ 'o bya ba dang rab tu 'khyud pa la sogs pa thams cad ster bas so/ /rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par nyid/ /ces bya ba la gnas ni se ru rab tu bshad/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor
108b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsungs/ /gnyis med dga' ba'i rang bzhin rgyal/ /bde chen gang du gnas pas na/ /de phyir mchog gi pad+ma gnas/ /khu khrag 'dres shing gang ba ni/ /khyad par du ni 'o byas nas/ /lce yis yang dag dril nas blang/ /chang 'thung rab tu dga' ba yis/ /rdo rje
108b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mnyam dkar sbyar/ /ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni zhes bya ba la dga' ba'i bstan bcos las bshad pa'i byed lugs de snyed rnams rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ /byang chub rab tu grub pas tha mal pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba shes par bya'o/ /de nyid
108b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis na/ bden can kun la sbyin bya yi/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /ma dang sring mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o/ /gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa/ zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de nyid dang sbyor bas/ shes rab ye shes so zhes
108b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rnyed dka' i dam tshig nga yis bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med ces bya ba ni gang zhig bstan pa de thams cad he ru ka'i sbyor bas bya'o/ /gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don no/ /de nyid kyis na slob dpon rnal 'byor
108b7(rgyud 'grel): ma nyid yin zhes pa ste/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ma ni rnal 'byor ma'o/ /de'i phyir brnyas mi bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnal 'byor gzhan dang kun sbyor bas zhes bya ba la/ snying rje chen po rab dga' ba'i/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs spangs nas//
109a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod lha'i dngos grub bsgrub don du/ /rnal 'byor gzhan la brten byas pas/ /gang zhig dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/ /dmus long bzhin du rnam par rmongs/ /rgyal srid las nyams rgyal po bzhin/ /nges par sdug bsngal gyis rmongs 'gyur/ /
109a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa gsungs pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /rigs rnams thams cad mnyam par sbyar/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /nyan pa la sogs dbang po kun/ /bsre zhing bde bar bsdu bar
109a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi/ /tshangs spyod stong pa nyid du 'gyur/ /brjed med dran pa'i spyod pa yis/ /bde ba rtogs par byed pa'i gzhi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam dag pa'i/ /de nyid bla na med pa ni/ /dam tshig spyod pa rab tu gsungs/ /byang chub bsgrub la gnas
109a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya/ /rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong du/ /zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud chen po'i rang bzhin du bya ba'i sbyor ba dang mtshungs pa ma yin no/ /mi gzhom zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa'i
109a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid du blta bar mi bya ste/ rgyud de dang de rnams ni rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dam tshig mi spyod shin tu sbas/ /gang la mi sbyin mi bya ste/ /skal ldan sems can rnams la bshad/ /kha la sogs pa brgya po ni/ /mos dang dad pas 'phel byed pas/ /zhes bya ba la/
109a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa nges shing/ byang chub kyi lam thams cad la khyab pas legs par gnas pa'o/ /dad pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni/ chos rnams dad pas gzung bya ste/ /shes rab ldan pa'i de nyid rig ces pa'o/ /de nyid kyis na brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis
109a7(rgyud 'grel): pa las gsungs pa/ lag pas ma yin dung por min/ /mkhas pas lce yis blang bya ste/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel byed pas/ /yang dag ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /mthe'u chung zhes bya ba mthe'u chung ni tshogs dang ldan pa ste lo bcu gcig pa'i bdag nyid bzung
109b1(rgyud 'grel): nas rna lce yis blangs te ra sa ya nA'i dngos grub brtsam pa ni bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu'o/ /bsgrub pa ni gsum du gnas/ zhes bya ba ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i bya brag gis so/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi
109b2(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas dpa' bo spyod brtul zhugs/ /zhes bya ba la kun la spyod pas na spyod pa'o/ /brtul zhugs ni rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa'o/ /dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o/ /de su zhig ce na rnal 'byor ma
109b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams rab bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'o/ /mtshan nyid dbye ba shes byas nas zhes bya ba la/ /phung po khams sogs mdor bsdus nas/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya/ /'jig rten chos brgyad yongs shes shing/ /dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can/ /kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal nas//
109b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba byas pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa brten par bya/ /'khar gsil lhung bzed chos gos dang/ /chu tshags sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis/ /yan lag lung bzhin mi spang ste/ /lung ma gtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can du 'gyur/ /shes
109b5(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyin dmigs pa/ /lhag pa yi ni lha gcig nyid/ /stong pa'i ye shes yang dag 'byung/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /sngon bzhin drag shul rnam 'gyur dpal/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad/ /mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa'o/ /gtsug na zla ba
109b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i ral pas brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing/ /stag gi pags pas rnam dkris pa/ /phyed krung bcas pas shin tu gnas/ /sdang ba thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /sred dang rmongs pa phrag dog
109b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /kra la rA Ti 'og tu mnan/ /spyan gsum zhal bzhi mgrin pa bzhi/ /mkha' ltar sngo skya ser dang dmar/ /steng gi zhal ni ljang gu ste/ /rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug cing/ /phag mo dang ni gnyis med dga' / /chos kyi 'khor lo 'khar gsil sno/ /mdung dang zhags pa
110a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu'i phyag /de bzhin mgo dang rde chung ste/ /phyag gnyis na ni chos gos so/ /mi lpags snam bu gnyis kyis 'phyar/ /phag mo mdog dmar gcer bu la/ /spyan gsum skra ni grol ba ste/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rab 'bar ba/ /g.yon pas ro yi
110a2(rgyud 'grel): lhung bzed de/ /g.yas pa rde chung chos dbyangs sgrogs/ /byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing/ /snying rje dga' ba'i bde ba che/ /shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la/ /rngon pa dang gdol pa ni/ /btso blag mkhan dang puk+ka si/ /shan pa ma dang ri khrod ma/ /de bzhin nya pa sA ba ri/
110a3(rgyud 'grel): ser dang sngo dmar dud kha dang/ /skya bo dang ni dmar dang ljang/ /de bzhin brgyad pa dkar po ste/ /lugs su 'byung dang lugs las bzlog /gzhan dang zhi dang snying rje dang/ /sgeg dang ngam dang mi sdug pa/ /drag shul khro bo'i nyams dang ldan/ /sgo bzhir khro mo dgod par bya/ /he ru ka yi
110a4(rgyud 'grel): rang snang ba/ /rdo rje gtum mo rdo rje'o/ /srin mo rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'i/ /drag shul gdul dka' kun gsol ma/ /thal ba'i mdog dang ljang gu dang/ /dmar dang sngo ba drag shul 'jigs/ /lhung bzed dang ni 'khar gsil g.yon/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rde chung g.yas/ /phrag pa'i steng
110a5(rgyud 'grel): na chos gos 'phyar/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /ro steng phyed krung gar gyis ni/ /bzhugs shing skra grol gcer bu'o/ /bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum/ /phyis mi len dang cog pu pa/ /stan gcig pa dang bla khab med//
110a6(rgyud 'grel): shing drung pa dang dgon pas/ /dur khrod pa dang phyag dar khrod/ /phyid pa can dang bzhi ji bzhin/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis po/ /de rnams rnam dag rnal 'byor pa/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i/ /chos kyi 'dul ba'i tshul khrims kyis/ /rab tu mgu zhing snying rje
110a7(rgyud 'grel): che/ /dga' ba'i rab tu mdzes pa'o/ /de rnams dang lhan cig spyod cing rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang bcas pa des yid dga' zhing/ rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa byas nas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i bde bas bzlas pa bya ste/ /oM sh+rI mahA su kha badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA//
110b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bzas la longs spyod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang/ brtul zhugs b+hu su ku'i spyod pa'i rim pa 'dis spyad par bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te b+hu zhes bya ba ni za ba ste/ de tsam 'ba' zhig rjes su dran zhing 'du 'dzi thams cad yongs su spangs nas/ /dka' thub dang bsnyen
110b2(rgyud 'grel): ? la sogs pa cung zad tsam yang bsam par mi bya'o/ /su zhes bya ba ni gnyid log pa ma rig pas nye bar mtshon pa 'di dag rnam par shes pa tsam du mngon du byas la dge ba'i rnam par bsnyen pa'o/ /de ci zhe na slar yang 'jug par bya ste/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
110b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyid du mngon du byas te/ rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /ku zhes bya ba ni bshad par 'gro ba ste/ bshang gci tsam zhig 'dor bar byed pa'o/ /des de tsam zhig rjes su bsams nas 'du 'ji yongs su spangs nas/ /lus dang tshor ba dang yul dang dbang po'i
110b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin par bsam par mi bya'o/ /yul dang yul du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ ngal na phyi rol song nas pho nya'i mtshan nyid nye bar dpyad nas sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs la 'jug par bya'o/ /pho nya mo rnams legs 'dres pas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang
110b5(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /bla med mchog gi byang chub ni/ /'bad pa med par thob par 'gyur/ /myur ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni/ 'od gsal ye shes dag par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pa mtshan bya/ /bsam gtan 'byor pa 'di yis ni/ /sems kyi rin chen rtag 'gyur na/ /byin gyis rlob par
110b6(rgyud 'grel): byed 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu gnas/ /lo grangs bcu drug bzung bya ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /bzhin bzangs ma ni mig yangs ma/ /rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /brtul zhugs chen pos dus bzhir ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod
110b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rtag tu bya/ /zla ba drug gis de dag kun/ /'grub 'gyur 'di ni gdon mi za/ /zas la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ phyag rgya che la zhugs pa ni/ /de ni bza' ba kun 'dus yin/ /rigs kun la ni kun spyod yin/ /rigs gcig nyid du brtag par bya/ /ji ltar me
111a1(rgyud 'grel): yis gser bsregs bzhin/ /de bzhin sngags kyis kha zas bsgrub /oM sarba badzra kA mi Ni sarba b+hak+Sha sho d+ha ya gu dya badzri Ni hUM swAhA/ mi 'chi bcu phyed mar dang ni/ /sbrang rtsir lhan cig ldan byas la/ /'thungs na sman gyi dam pa ste/ /rga dang 'chi ba
111a2(rgyud 'grel): ring du spong/ /gzhon zhing nad med dpal dang ldan/ /gzugs bzangs 'dod lha 'gro ba'i bdag/ de nyid dbyer med de yi ni/ /pho nya mo gnyis bsgrub pa la/ /zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i don du rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya gnyis phun sum tshogs par bya ste/
111a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig ni gsang ba sbyin pa'i don du'o/ /gnyis pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi don du ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang/ gnyis pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i dbugs dbyung ba'i rjes su gnang ba byin la/ de'i rjes su pho nya gcig pu sbyin te/ slob ma
111a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po nyid kyis brtul zhugs gzugs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub par bya'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen dam pa yang dag par sbyin pa gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba'i man ngag gi rim pas dbang bskur ba thob pa
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba 'di ston pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis yang dag par gsungs pa'i ye shes yang dag par rdzogs lus skyes zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o zhes bya'o/ /nang par sngar langs zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal bar gyur pa
111a6(rgyud 'grel): las so/ /nying lag gis ni bstan bcos rnams/ /lus la gnas pa kun tu spyad/ /ces bya ba la yan lag shin tu dman pas na nying lag ste/ byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga 'o/ /bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /kun tu spyod pa dang bsod
111a7(rgyud 'grel): nams ye shes 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bstan bcos rnams ni rnal 'byor gyi bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid yin la kun tu spyod pa rnams ni kun spyod do/ dag byed byas pa lus dang ni/ /zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom pas so/ /de yang rim pa 'dis bdag
111b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsam par bya ste/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa nyid ni/ b+h+ruM aM h+rI:ho(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ mi bskyod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
111b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nyid du gyur pa ni dpal he ru ka ste hi yis so/ /mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ni/ oM hUM traM aM/ baM haM gis gti mug dang zhe sdang dang ser sna dang 'dod chags dang phrag dog dang dbang phyug rdo rje'o/ /dza hUM baM h+ro(rgyud 'grel): khaM raM/ gis gzugs rdo rje la sogs
111b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /lAM mAM hAM tAM khAM gis ni sa dang chu dang/ me dang rlung dang/ nam mkha' rnams/ spyan ma dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma dang rdo rje phag mo rnams so/ /oM A:hUM hUM gis sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes sems dpa' rnams so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
111b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la b+h+ruM aM h+ri khaM hUM A a'i a'u e'o/ /longs spyod pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa la/ oM A a'i a'u e ste dbyangs yig lnga'o/ /bde ba chen po pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa la haM ngo/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa la ni a ka tsa Ta
111b5(rgyud 'grel): ta ba ya sha ste sde tshan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ g.yon dang g.yas pa dang/ yi ge ka la sogs pa dbus su sbyar bar bya'o/ /pu dza o a go rA de mA kA o tri ko kA la ka hi/ bre gri sau su na si ma ku dang/ baM pra maM tsaM kaM praM biM maM suM biM/ oM khaM baM laM maM druM aM oM baM maM maM
111b6(rgyud 'grel): baM baM/ suM suM shaM/ baM suM maM haM/ baM khaM maM tsaM raM khaM haM/ saM aM tsaM sh+ra suM baM maM/ nai tsaM baM maM/ mgo bo dang spyi gtsug dang/ rna ba g.yas pa dang/ rgyab logs dang/ rna ba g.yon pa dang/ smin ma'i dbus dang/ mig gnyis dang/ dbung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis dang/ mchan khung
111b7(rgyud 'grel): dag dang/ nu ma gnyis dang/ lte ba dang/ sna rtse dang/ kha dang mgrin pa dang/ snying ga dang/ chu so dang/ mtshan dang/ bshang ba'i lam dang/ brla gnyis dang/ byin pa gnyis dang/ ser mo rnams dang/ rkang pa'i khol dang/ mthe bo gnyis dang pus mo ru'o/ /sen
112a1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang so ni rab gtum ma'o/ /skra dang spu ni gtum pa'i mig go /pags pa dang dri ma la ni 'od ldan ma'o/ /sha la ni sna chen ma'o/ /rgyus pa la ni dpa' bo'i blo ma'o/ /rus pa la ni mi'u thung ma'o/ /mchin pa la ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /snying
112a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni ljon 'khril ma'o/ /mig gnyis la ni sa srungs ma'o/ /mkhris pa la ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /glo ba la ni rlung gi shugs ma'o/ /gyu ma la ni chang 'thung ma'o/ /gnyem la ni lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o/ /lto ba la ni shin tu bzang mo'o/ /chus so la ni ta na mo'o/ /'doms
112a3(rgyud 'grel): par la ni bya'i gdong pa can no/ /bad kan la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /rnag la ni dum skyes ma'o/ /khrag la ni glang sna ma'o/ /rdul la ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /tshil la ni rab tu dpa' mo'o/ /mchi ma la ni stobs chen ma'o/ /mchil ma la ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ /snabs la ni brtson
112a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grus chen mo ste/ de ltar mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags pa'o/ /bstan bcos ci gsungs dor mi bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ bdud rtsi rnams ni sman gyi mchog /mi bskyod pa sten pas rnal 'byor pa/ nad rnams thams cad 'joms par
112a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rtag pa yi ni gzi che zhing/ /'od dpag med pas stobs che la/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgas pa med/ /gang phyir don yod rgyal po che/ /sems can kun lus las byung ba/ /don kun bsgrub pa dpal dang ldan/ /sbyor ba de yis mnyam nyid 'gyur/ /mi bskyod 'thung ba'i
112a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa/ /stong phrag sngar ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /rtag pas khri phrag rab tu gsungs/ /bye bar don yod rdo rje can/ /'od dpag med kyis tshe mdza' med/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgas pa med/ /'khor ba bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba gnyis/ /'di yis brten byed rnal 'byor pa/ /kun tu
112a7(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang mnyam 'gyur/ /dag par byas pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya/ zhes bya ba ni/ oM A nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+honyahaM/ oM swA b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ oM shU n+ya trA dz+nyA na badzra swa stwA ba At+ma
112b1(rgyud 'grel): so haM/ zhes pa'o/ /rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan zhing/ /zhes bya ba ni rang gi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje can la'o mtshon cha rnams ni bgom mi bya/ zhes bya ba ni dam tshig yongs su bskyang ba ste/ de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po'o/ /dam tshig
112b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyis khro mi bya/ /zhes bya ba ni dag pa'i lam la legs par gnas pa rnams la'o/ /mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor lo sdom par dbang bskur ba'i bla ma dang slob ma gnyis la brnyas pa mi bya ba ste/ gang gi phyir pho nya mo'i
112b3(rgyud 'grel): bka' thob pa'i phyir/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bsod nams kyi tshogs bskal pa du mar bsags pa yang de'i mod la 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /de'i don zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i don du'o/ /mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa bya ba'o/ /gnag dang
112b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni he ru ka'i gzugs su'o/ /dmar zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mor ro/ /'gul to zhes bya ba ni gsal lo/ /bde ba 'dod pas bde bskyong bya zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos par bde ba ste/ bde ba de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis phyogs bcur gsal bar byed pa
112b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'di lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi mar me snang ba shin tu chags pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas lhan cig skyes pa'i snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o/ /rigs dang rigs min zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho ga dang/ bslab
112b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dang po'i las can sems can la/ /snying rje'i rgyu yis gzung bar bya/ /bsgom pa yis ni bar chad can/ /srid pa'i 'chid dang ldan pa bzhin/ /rmongs pa'i mchog tu gyur pa nyid/ /de bas 'ching ba spangs gyur na/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/ /don de
112b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya/ zhes pa'o de la/ zhal bzhir gsungs pa gang yin pa/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gsungs/ /dga' kun rdzogs pa'i byang chub gcig /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ zhal gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ / 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum srid pa gsum du shar/ /thog mdza' med pa'i chos rnams ni/ /bems po'i rang bzhin las bzlog pa/ /ral pa'i don du rab tu gsungs/ /sna tshogs sems can don mdzad pas/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa yin/ /zla
113a2(rgyud 'grel): ba byang chub sems 'gyur ba/ /bde chen rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/ /srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis phyir/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang mngon du ldan/ /yul rnams dang ni dbang po rnams/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i spyod yul gyis/ /phyag rnams mtshan mas mtshan pa
113a3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rjer gyur/ /shes rab dril bu rab tu brjod/ /sku gsum dag phyir mdung rtse gsum/ /glang po gti mug dral ba ste/ /dgra sta zhe sdang gcod byed pa/ /lus ngag sems las yang dag byung/ /zhags pas nyes pa 'ching pa ste/ /lus can ma lus
113a4(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun phyogs/ /sems can don byed rtsom pas na/ /zangs gri shin du rno ba'o/ /mgo bo tshangs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /kha TwAM stong pa'i rnam pa ste/ /cang te'u thabs rnam dag pa'o/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /chos kyi dbyangs sgra hUM mdzad pa'o/ /thod pa nam mkha' i
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ /snying rje ro yis yongs bkang ba'o/ /gsol ba dngos grub rgyu yin no/ /mche ba bzhi ni mngon gyur pa/ /bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad pa'o/ /'od zer 'khrigs pas 'khrug ldan pa'i/ /rtag tu tshes kyi phreng ba gnyis/ /snying rje ro yis yongs
113a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad bas/ /ha har bzhad pas gsal mdzad zhal/ /nyon mongs bdud bzhi bdag nyid pas/ /mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan byas/ /stong nyid dag pa'i sdig mdzub bo/ /'od zer pa nya gtsang sbra dang po yin/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal ba thams cad bde ba'i rin
113a7(rgyud 'grel): chen gyis 'byung gnas phyir ro/ /zhi ba ni bdud rtsi dang chang ngo/ /zas gcig bu ni za ba nyid/ ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir rigs du ma nyid rigs gcig pas na dbye ba mi skye ba de ltar bya'o/ /gtsang sbra 'di ni yang spyad bya zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/ /rnam dag
113b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid ye shes kyis/ /ma rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo/ /gang yang kha cig brtson 'grus go 'phang dman pas thob par ma gyur na yang/ sprul bzhin du lus 'di yongs su btang nas gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par de bzhin
113b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lta bur 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas ni/ /chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rang bzhin las byung bas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang 'dra bar sems can thams
113b3(rgyud 'grel): cad nye bar 'tsho zhing sems can skyob pa'i sems kyis smon lam btab pas skye ba dang skye bar bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs su skye skye ste/ dpal dang ldan pa'i shAkya'i mgon pos/ ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de bas na bca' ba dang btung ba la sogs
113b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun sogs mchod/ /ces pa'o/ /rang 'dod pa yi las rnams la/ /dad pas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa rnams la'o/ /mar ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sgra ji bzhin pa'o/ /mdzub mo mdung byas gung
113b5(rgyud 'grel): mo nges par spyad/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan par yang dag bsdam/ /'di ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas/ /bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor bar bya/ /sngags 'di brjod par byas la/ /oM a ra l+le to(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwaM dri sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lan
113b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum bzhir brjod do/ /gcer bu spyi gtsug grol 'gyur bas/ /sgrub pos gnas ni mthon po ru/ /lho phyogs kha bltas bzhag nas ni/ /mtshan mo phyed na gtor ma byin/ /mthon po'i gnas zhes bya ba ni/ /ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i steng du lha yi dkyil 'khor
113b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sbyor bas/ /'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin pa ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /rim pa lnga yi dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid kyi la la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yongs gyur las/ /bdag nyid he ru kar bsgo
114a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rtag dang chad pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan 'og tu byas/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /sku mdog sngo zhing drag chen po/ /'jig dus me ltar drag shul
114a2(rgyud 'grel): che/ /spyan gsum 'jigs shing rngam pa ste/ /rgod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis byin gyis brlabs/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa bcings/ /byang chub zla bas nye bar mdzes/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan byas/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa
114a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /zhes drug pa la bcu drug phyag /dpa' ba mi sdug sgeg pa dang/ /bzhad dang drag shul ljags 'gril zhal/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dang ni dkar po nyid/ /steng gi zhal ni cher drag cing/ /nam mkha' i cha la longs spyod pa/ /ha har bzhad
114a4(rgyud 'grel): dang hUM hUM mdzad /hi hi zhes pas 'jigs mdzad pa/ /hUM hUM mdzad bcas phaT mdzad pa/ /yi ge oM oM zhes brjod cing/ /rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug pa/ lha yi nu ma 'tshir mdzad pa/ /dus mdza' i drag po 'jigs pa yi/ /pags pa na bza' bsnams
114a5(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dzin/ /thod pa kha TwAM mdung rtse gsum/ /zangs gri dang ni dgra sta dang/ /lcags kyu zhags pa mgo dang ni/ /cang te'u de bzhin mdung thung ni/ /gnyis kyis dra ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dpral ba'i steng du legs gnas pa'i/ /phag mo'i mdog dang phyag  
114a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra ba ste/ 'on kyang pags pa'i gos spangs shing/ /mda' gzhu 'dzin pa'i lha mo phyag /lha mo'i skra grol gcer bu la/ /dum bus mtshan pa'i ska rags can/ /byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud nas/ /snying rjes chags pa'i bde
114a7(rgyud 'grel): ba can/ /'gro drug srid pa yang dag spyod/ /sems can don la brtson par mdzad/ /'dab mar pho nya ba'i kho na/ /sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ste/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan
114b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gcer bu skra grol ba/ /brang gi nu ma rab rgyas shing/ /sgeg bcas rnam par bzhad pa'i zhal/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon pas lcags kyu zhags pa dang/ /lcags sgrog dang 'bebs pa yi phyag/ dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang/ /bcing dang mchog tu
114b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byed pa'o/ /gzhan gyi gri dang thod pa dang/ /kha TwAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis legs par bzhugs/ /snying rjes chags pa'i myos ldan yang/ /'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mtshams su bum pa dang thod pa/ /bza' ba kun gyis
114b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs bkang ba/ /steng du thod pa byang chub kyi/ /'o mas yongs su bkang pa'o/ /lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs shing/ /ye shes sems dpa' i go cha gnyis/ /pu la sogs pa yang dag sbyar/ /dbang bskur nas ni mchod bya ste/ /bka' bzhin du ni bstod byas la/ /shing
114b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang ni dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su ni/ ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rjes su 'brangs nas/ 'jig rten pa thams cad dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zhing skyong la sogs pa dgod par bya ste/ de la rim pa 'di
114b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /phag mo dang ni dge ma gnyis/ /gzhon nu ma dang tsa muN+Di/ /tshangs pa dang ni tshogs bdag ma/ /khyab 'jug dbang po brgyad par bshad/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i'o/ /rim pa gsum pa la ni/ dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang/ gnod sbyin yi dags gtso mo dang//
114b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg byed srin po rlung gi lha/ /rim pa bzhi ba la ni/ nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang/ /gza' lhag dang ni phur bu dang/ /pa bsangs dang spen pa dang/ /sgra gcan 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan no/ /rim pa lnga pa la ni/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin drag /skem byed nyid ni
114b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhir ro/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su/ /h+rI:yig las byung lha mo ni/ /phag mo zhes bya phyag bzhi pa/ mda' dang gzhu dang de bzhin du/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /mdog sngon drag mo chen mo ste/ /phag gi gdong can 'jigs byed de?/ /byang du
115a1(rgyud 'grel): pheM gis dge ma ni/ /mdog dmar dgra mo chen mo ste/ /thod pa nyid dang lcags kyu dang/ /kha TwAM cang te'u de bzhin no/ /nub tu hi yis gzhon nu ma/ /mdog ser ba la phyag bzhi na/ /mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum/ /gzhu dang mda' ni 
115a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no/ /lho ru hi yis tsA muN+Di/ /mdog sngo ba la phyag bzhin/ /kha TwAM nyid dang thod pa dang/ /de bzhin ral gri cang te'u'o/ /me mtshams baM gyis tshangs pa ni/ /sku mdog dkar mo phyag bzhi na/ /tshangs pa'i sku dang thor ba nyid/ /gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin no//
115a3(rgyud 'grel): srin bor gaM gis tshogs bdag ma/ /mdog ljang ma la phyag bzhi na/ /mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa'i phyag /bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o/ /rlung du baM gyis khyab 'jug ma/ /mdog sngon ma la phyag bzhi na/ /chang dang chu yi thod pa dang/ /zhags pa kha TwAM de bzhin
115a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan/ /dbang ldan i yig las byung ma/ /dbang mo mdog ser phyag bzhin/ /rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid/ /lha mo thams cad gyen skra 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /mi ro'i stan bzhugs spyan gsum ma//
115a5(rgyud 'grel): stag gis pags pas rked pa dkris/ /rim pa gsum par dbang ldan yaM gis gnod sbyin ni/ /khyu mchog stan la bzhugs pa ste/ /mdog dkar pa la phyag bzhi na/ /thod pa dang ni mdung rtse gsum/ /thal mo sbyar la gzhol ba'o/ /shar du i skyes brgya byin ni//
115a6(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i stan la bzhugs pa ste/ /mdog ser phyag ni bzhi pa la/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa'i phyag /phyag gi thal mo sbyar bar mdzad/ /me mtshams baM gyis drang srong ni/ /mdog dmar phyag bzhir skyes zhon/ /me thab dang ni thod pa dang/ /skrag pas thal mo sbyor la
115a7(rgyud 'grel): brtson/ /lho ru yaM gis nyi ma'i bu/ /mdog sngo phyag bzhi ma he zhon/ /dbyug pa thod pa bsnams pa dang/ /skrag pas thal mo sbyar la zhon/ /bden bral raM gis srin po ni/ /mdog ljang phyag bzhi mi ro zhon/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa thags/ /skrag pas thal mo
115b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar la brtson/ /nub tu baM gyis chu yi bdag /mdog dkar phyag bzhi chu srin stan/ /zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ /skrag pas thal mo sbyor la gzhol/ /rlung mtshams yaM gis rlung gi bdag dang kha phyag bzhi ri dags zhon/ /ba dan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin thal
115b2(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyor pa brtson/ /byang du kuM gis ku be ra/ /mdog ser phyag bzhi bum par bzhugs/ /rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin/ /thal mo sbyar la gzhol bar mdzad/ /rim pa bzhi ba la ni/ shar du nyi ma mdog dmar ba/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni pad+ma 'dzin/ /thal mo sbyor
115b3(rgyud 'grel): la brtson par mdzad/ /rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rta zhon/ /me mtshams saM gis pa bsangs/ /kha dog dkar bo 'bar ba ste/ /g.yon pa pad steng me nor bu/ /g.yas pa de bzhin thod pa ste/ /thal sbyar ba la ra skyes zhon/ /lho ru oM gis mig dmar ni/ /mdog
115b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar ro yi gdan la gnas/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'dzin/ /thal mo sbyor la gzhol bar byed/ /srin por raM gis sgra gcan 'dzin/ /g.yas pa nyi ma g.yon zla ba/ /dung kha thal mo sbyar byas la/ /lus phyed rang gi bstan la gnas/ /nub tu saM gis spen
115b5(rgyud 'grel): ba sngo/ /phyag gnyis thod pa thogs pa dang/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa'i phyag /me yi thab kyi steng du ni/ /me bzhin 'bar bas gnas pa'o/ /rlung du shaM gis zla ba dkar/ /g.yon du pad+ma zla nor bu/ /g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng du zla/ /thal mo sbyar byas ngang pa zhon/ /
115b6(rgyud 'grel): byang du baM gis phur bu ser/ /g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs te/ /g.yas su de bzhin thod pa'o/ /thal sbyar rin chen stan la gnas/ /dbang ldan buM gyis gza' lag dkar/ /g.yas pa na ni rin chen mda'/ /g.yon pa na ni thod pa'o/ /thal sbyar bum pa'i stan
115b7(rgyud 'grel): la gnas/ /kaM gis rgyal mtshan sprul gzugs dmar/ /phyag gnyis ral gri thal sbyar ba/ /de bzhin rgyu skar rnams bud med kyis gzugs can te/ tha skar ni dkar ba'o/ /bra nye ni ljang gu'o/ /smin drug ni sngo bsangs so/ /snar ma ni dmar skya'o/ /mgo ni sngon
116a1(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /lag ni ser po'o/ /na bso ni ser po'o/ /rgyal ni sngo bsangs so/ /skag ni dkar po'o/ /mchu ni ser po'o/ /gre ni ljang ser ro/ /dbo ni ljang gu'o/ /mi bzhi ni dkar po'o/ /nag pa ni ljang gu'o/ /sa ri ni ser po'o/ /sa ga ni sngon po'o//
116a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mtshams ni sngo bsangs so/ /snron ni ser po'o/ /snabs ni ljang gu 'o/ /chu stod ni sngon po'o/ /chu smad ni dkar po'o/ /gro bzhin ni skya bo'o/ /phyi bzhin ni sngo bsangs so/ /mon gru ni sngon po'o/ /mon dre ni ser po'o/ /khrums bstod ni ljang gu'o/ /khrums smad ni ser po'o/ /nam
116a3(rgyud 'grel): ? ni ser skya'o/ /thams cad ni gser gyi stong g.yogs can la thal mo sbyar bar bsam mo/ /rim pa lnga par ni shar sgor baM las tshangs pa ni mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa'o/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang/ /spyi blugs dang ni pad+ma nyid/ /byang sgor khaM las skyes
116a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /khyab 'jug ces bya phyag bzhi pa/ /mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang/ /thod pa nyid dang dbyug pa'o/ /nub tu saM las drag po ni/ /dud pa'i mdog las phyag bzhi pa/ /mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin zhags pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /lho ru kaM las
116a5(rgyud 'grel): skem byed ni/ /mdog ser phyag ni bzhi pa la/ /mdung thung dbyug pa thod pa dang/ /de bzhin bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'o/ /de dag kun kyang bu dang bu mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas shing/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor chen
116a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i de nyid kyi sa'i dbus su/ /shar du ru dra nag po ste/ /byang du ru dra chen po'o/ /nub tu lha sbyin zhes bya ba/ /lho ru de bzhin nag po'o/ /dbang ldan du ni gtsigs pa ste/ /me mtshams su ni mi sdug pa'o/ /bden bral dga' las 'das pa ste/ /rlung mtshams su ni log
116a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dren no/ /de kun zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/ /phyag bzhi gri dang thod pa dang/ /kha TwAM mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag /gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang/ /mtshams na gnas pa rnams ni/ yid 'phrog pa gzugs gnyis pa'o/ /ru dra nag po'i mdun du
116b1(rgyud 'grel): ni tsa muN+Di'o/ /g.yon du ni drag mo'o/ /rgyab tu mi sdug ma'o/ /g.yas su dka' bzlog lha mo'o/ /de dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i mdog can phyag gnyis mchod pa lngas gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /ru dra chen po'i mdun du ni/ /rgyal ma dang rnam rgyal ma dang mi thub ma dang
116b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams te/ bca' ba dang btung ba 'dzin pa/ lA ma'i mdog can no/ /nub tu lha byin gyi btsun mo/ nag mo bzang mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ nag mo sbo mo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams te/ khaN+Da ro he'i mdog can phyag na mchod pa lngas bkang ba'o/ /lho ru nag po'i btsun
116b3(rgyud 'grel): mo dbang mo dang/ zla ba mo dang drag mo dang ldan ma rnams te/ gzugs can ma'i mdog can phyag na bza' btung thogs pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ni gtsigs pa'i btsun mo 'phyang ma dang lha'i dbang phyug ma dang/ dung can ma dang mar me ma rnams te/ tsa muN+Di'i
116b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog can phyag na bza' btung thogs pa'o/ /me mtshams su ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs dang/ grong khyer du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang/ drag po'i gzugs can ma dang/ /gzugs chen mo ste/ dbang mo'i mdog can sngon du bstan pa bzhin du phyag na ston mo
116b5(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa/ bden bral du dga' las 'das pa'i chung ma mche ba'i gzugs dang/ gtsigs ma dang thod pa'i phreng ba can ma gshin rje'i kha TwAM ga 'phyar ba'o/ /nag mo bzang pa'i mdog can bza' ba dang btung ba lag na thogs pa'o/ /rlung du log 'dren 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi chung ma lag na ral gri dang dgra sta ma dang/ lag na rdo rje ma dang/ lag na pad+ma can ma rnams te/ rgyal ma la sogs pa'i mdog can lag na bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa thogs pa'o/ /yang shar phyogs kyi rta babs kyi mdun gyi dur khrod du
116b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed thod phreng can dang srin po dang/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang dril rna ste/ bzhi po de dag chung ma dang bcas shing mkha' 'gro ma'i mdog can no/ /byang gi dur khrod du ni gtum pa'i dbang phyug dang/ dza yig rngam dang rked pa'i ru dra dang/ spom pa'i dbang phyug
117a1(rgyud 'grel): chung ma dang bcas pa lA ma'i mdog can no/ /nub phyogs kyi dur khrod du/ dmar dang 'dam ka dang pheg dang 'jigs su rung ba rnams chung ma dang bcas pa rnams khaN+Da ro he'i mdog can no/ /lho phyogs kyi dur khrod du ni sku'i dbang phyug dang/
117a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra yi chen dang mche ba gtsigs pa/ mda''dzin zhes bya ba rnams chung ma dang bcas pa/ gzugs can ma'i mdog go /de dag thams cad kyang zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa kha TwAM ga dang thod pa dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang lha mo la 'khyud pa ste/ sngar stan
117a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shing brgyad la yang gnas par yang blta bar bya'o/ /de dag thams cad 'jig rten gsum na grub pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ lha'i bu mo dang mi la sogs pa rnams kyis phyogs bzhi kun tu mdun du bsngar ba/ yi dags sha za la sogs pa 'du ba/ ki li
117a4(rgyud 'grel): ki li'i sgra sgrogs par yid kyis blta bar bya zhing/ sgrub pa bo la yang mchog ster bas mngon par phyogs pa/ rang gi ming gi yi ge snying gar dgod cing lus ngag yid gsum/ oM A:hUM dang bcas pas rigs gsum las byung ba'o/ /de nas cho ga bzhin du
117a5(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil byin la dam tshig dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas/ rang gi 'khor lo la kha zas dbul bar bya ste/ phyag 'tshal dang dbus su a dang ldan pa/ yi ge hUM byas sbar ba yis/ /yi ge h+rI:las me dbar ba/ /ji srid bya ba rdzogs par du//
117a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thal mo gyen kha dbye/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /kha kha khA hi la sogs pa'i sngags kyis/ me tog dang bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs pas mchod do/ /de nas sems yang dag par mnyes nas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gtso bor
117a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas par bsam mo/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas mchod pa rnam dag
117b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /ces bya ba la/ rnam dag ces bya ba ni dngos po thams cad las so so ma yin pa nyid de/ gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'o/ /de las nges par byung ba ni dpa' bo'o/ /zhes bya ba la srid pa dang
117b2(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba dag pa mi gnas pa'i phyir te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su spyod pa ste/ tshogs ma lus pa bsags pa las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshogs spros nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i
117b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ni/ sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba ste de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid mchod par bya ba ni/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis ji ltar sbyor bas so/ /spun dang sdug pa'ang mchod par bya ste/ zhes bya ba ni lhan cig tu mnyan pa dang bsam pa dag pa dang nges
117b4(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba dang gcig tu byas pa'o/ /'ang gi sgras ni rnal 'byor ma nges par gzung ste/ gang gi phyir de rnams ma gtogs par de'i phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis na nges par gnas zhes bya ba ste/ lha mo dang 'dus pa'i sbyor bas so/ /zhi ba zhes bya ba
117b5(rgyud 'grel): ni chang ngo/ /yang na zhi ba'i bde ba'o/ /rtag tu shar ba 'od gsal ba/ /snying ga'i pad+mar nges brten nas/ /de 'dra stong pa nyid 'gyur ba/ /sems nyid bsgom par mi bya'o/ /zhes so/ /spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu zhes bya ba la brtse gdung gi byang chub tu sems
117b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa ma gtogs par bya ste/ sngags dang phyag rgya mchod cing dkyil 'khor dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang rdo rje'i glu yang thos pas dam tshig la skur zhing slob dpon la smod pa dang/ sems can thams cad sun 'byin par byed pa de'i phyir na
117b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon gyi bu dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur zhing/ de'i 'dus pa'i sems can gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems dri ma can du 'gyur ro/ /de rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ zas la spyad par bya ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /'di ni thun mong ngo/ khyad par du ji lta bu zhe na/
118a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gi phyir snying rje'i dbang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta ba de ltar de rnams la yang bstan par mi bya ste/ dad pa'i dbang gis de rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/
118a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la'o/ /spyin par bya zhes bya ba ni/ 'dir dbang bskur ba rnams la'o/ /pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lam dang 'dra bas lam ste/ byang chub kyi lam mo/ /de yang mdza' yas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang skye ba spyod pa
118a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ nyon mongs pa glo bur ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sprin dang khug rna dang du ba dang/ 'khrul ba tsam zhig gsal bas tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na de spangs nas rnal 'byor gzhan la brten par ni/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa dang/ kri ya dang
118a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'dod pa de dag rmongs pas dngos grub med cing bde ba med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal srid shor ba'i skyes bu bzhin dad pa'i nor dang phral phyir ro/ /zhes pa ni zhen pa'i lta bas blta ba'o/ /thar
118a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni grol ba ste pho nya la zhen pa nges grol ba'o/ /des na bde ba yis kyang longs spyod bya/ zhes bya ba ste/ bde ba thams cad ni b+ha ga las byung ba ni bdud rtsi nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro/ /bsnyen bkur kho na bya ba min zhes bya ba la bsnyen bkur gyi ni don can min/ /
118a6(rgyud 'grel): chags pas 'dus pas dga' ba ste/ de phyir 'khyud par rab tu bya/ /rjes su chags dang ldan pas thob/ /gzhan du bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skye gnas dman pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'o/ /'ang gi sgras ni bram ze mchog la sogs pa
118a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba'o/ de rnams kyang ma dang sring mo la sogs pa ltar shin tu gdung ba'i dbang gis so/ /dka' thub bdag nyid chen po yis/ /gang zhig rtag tu mchong byed pa/ /bshung zhing sman pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur/ /'khor lo de
118b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin grub pa yi/ zhes bya ba ni gang gi dam tshig dang sdom pa nyams pa rnams kyi yang phyis blang ba la ni rnal 'byor 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor pas/ /dam tshig sdom pa bla na med/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dam tshig dkyil
118b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bla na med/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ni/ /dbus su nyi stan yi dags la/ /A li kA lir yang dag ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig byas nas/
118b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge nyi las yang dag byung/ /'jigs dus 'od zer ltar 'jigs pa/ /spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /ljags 'gril khro dang bcas bzhad zhal/ /lta chen thams cad gsol mdzad pa/ /bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag 'khrug /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan
118b4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /'jigs byed pags pas rked pa dkris/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis legs bzhugs pas/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan kun tu mnan/ /dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed brgyan/ /sku la rgya drug rgyan du byas/ /phyag drug zhal ni lnga pa ste/
118b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs nyams dang ro mchog ldan/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang dang steng dkar zhi ba'o/ /shi ba 'ang gso bar byed pa'i mchog /sdang ba thams cad nges gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje dril bu snyoms zhugs shing/ /phag mo'i sku la yang dag 'khyud/ /sa srungs
118b6(rgyud 'grel): lpags pa na bza' 'dzin/ /steng du gdugs dkar gzung ba ltar/ /thod ba dang ni kha TwAM 'dzin/ /drug pa na ni cang te'u'o/ /de dang 'dra ba'i phag mo yis/ dbu skra grol zhing gcer pu la/ /mi rus rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /'on kyang pags pa'i gos kyi gnas su gri dang
118b7(rgyud 'grel): tshongs pa'i mgo dgod par bya'o/ /de shar sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste/ /de bzhin byang du las mkha' 'gro/ /nub tu chos kyi mkha' 'gro ste/ /lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro nyid/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar po dang/ /ljang gu dang steng dmar ser po/ /'khor lo dang dril bu snyoms
119a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug cing phyag gnyis kyis tshangs pa'i pags pa'i gos bsnams pa dang gzhan gyis thod pa dang kha TwAM ga dang cang te'u'o/ /g.yas brkyang bas tshangs pa khyo shugs mnan pa'o/ /yang ljang gu dang ser po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang de bzhin
119a2(rgyud 'grel): du lnga pa steng ma dkar te/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu snyoms par 'jug pa/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i pags pa bsnams pa dang/ gzhan gyis thod pa dang kha TwAM ga dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang gis gnas pas tshogs kyi bdag po khyo shugs mnan pas 'jigs
119a3(rgyud 'grel): shing myos pa'o/ /yang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang steng ma dkar po ste/ pad+ma dang dril bu snyoms par 'jug cing 'dod pa'i lha'i pags pa dral ba bsnams pa dang/ thod pa dang kha TwAM ga dang Da ma ru ste/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dod pa'i
119a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gi khyo shugs mnan pa'o/ /yang ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang de bzhin du steng ma dkar po ste/ rin po che dang dril bu snyoms par 'jug cing/ /dbang po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa dang thod pa dang kha TwAM ga dang cang te'u'o/ /g.yas
119a5(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba'i gnas pas dbang po khyo shugs mnan pa ste/ kun kyang spyan gsum pa phyag drug pa ral ba'i cod pan dang gyis bcings/ me mtshams dang bden bral dang/ rlung mtshams dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams rnams su ni sangs rgyas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rdo rje
119a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma dang/ pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dang/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams te/ dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o/ /yang sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po'o/ /yang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po'o/ /yang ljang gu dang sngon po dang ser po ste/ kun kyang
119a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug ba/ /spyan gsum gcer bu skra grol ba/ /phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o/ /nga rgyal bcas shing gar mdzad pa/ /snying rjes chags pa'i dga' dang ldan/ /'khor lo'i mda' dang rdo rje'i mda'/ /pad+ma'i mda' dang rin chen mda'/ /rang gi mtshams nas?
119b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i mda'/ /g.yon pa thams cad na gzhu'o/ /thod pa kha TwAM ga dang Da ma ru'o/ /gzhan gyis zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /shin tu zlum zhing re mig dgu/ /phyi rol gru bzhi sgo bzhir ldan/ /de la shar sgor ni gzugs mangs so/ /khyad du ni
119b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bzang ngo/ /nub tu rdo rje dpyig pa can no/ /lhor ni rdo rje snang ba'o/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs ba ste/ /sngon bstan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro sogs/ /rim bzhin mtshan ma thogs ba'o/ /de yi phyi rim yul
119b3(rgyud 'grel): du yang/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang/ /dar dang me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba ste/ de la lha'i snam bu gru bzhi pa'i me'i mtshams la sogs pa'i g.yon skor gyis dgod par bya ba ni rdo rje'i kha dang drag po'i kha dang/ rdo rje phag
119b4(rgyud 'grel): snam dang/ snyan grags ldan ma dang/ rdo rje pho nya mo dang rdo rje sen mo dang rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang/ rdo rje dung can ma dang rdo rje dri ma dang/ rdo rje nyal ma dang/ dri can ma dang 'jings ma'i zhal dang spyi gtsug zla ba dang khro gnyer ma dang/ sna tshogs kyi gzugs ma dang/
119b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lus can ma dang rdo rje sgrog ma dang/ sgyu 'phrul lha mo dang snyan byed ma dang khams pa ma ste/ de ltar lha mo nyi shu'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje 'bar pa ma dang/ byang du ni rdo rje 'khyil ma'o/ /nub tu ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/ lhor ni rdo rje grub ma'o/ /de
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'o/ /sgo bsrung ba thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba gsus pa 'phyang ba'o/ /gzhan dag ni sna tshogs kyi gzugs can rol pa mo thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa
119b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa dpa' bo dang sgeg pa dang snying rje ros gang ba nu ma rgyas shing skal pa dang ldan ma gcer bu skra grol ba snying rje chen pos chags pa'i dga' ba'i dam pa ro'i gdan la bzhugs pas gar byed pa'i mchog ste/ thod pa dang kha TwAM ga dang rde chung
120a1(rgyud 'grel): gi bdag nyid can/ zhags pa dang lcags kyu can rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol ba'o/ /de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs la go cha gnyis kyis brgyan nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo de la dgug pa ste/ dbang bskur ba la yang dag
120a2(rgyud 'grel): par mchod nas/ bstod pa byas la sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM sh+rI badzra DA ka a hi hUM DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ gus pa'i bsam pas rtag tu bzlas par bya ste/ rdo rje mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o/ /oM sh+rI bud+d+ha DA kaM a b+h+ruM hUM DA kaM ni dzA la sam+ba raM
120a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+rI karma DA ka a khaM hUM DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+rI pad+ma DA ka a d+h+ri hUM DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM sh+rI ratna DA ka a aM hUM DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM sh+rI badzra baM ta ri baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ /de ltar mkha' 
120a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma thams cad kyi bzlas pa'i sngags rab tu bshad pa'o/ /sdom pa 'di rnam par nges par gzung na rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i dngos grub bzang po gdon mi za/ mchog dang tha ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang yang gzhan dag sngon du grub pa dam tshig can gyis
120a5(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa'i go 'phang dran par bya ste/ mchog tu ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes ma'o/ /dbus ma la ni zhing las skyes ma'o/ /tha ma ni sngags skyes ma'o/ /des lhan cig skyes pa de ni rdzas ni rnam par nges pa yin zhes bya ba ste/ rtsar chud pa'i dbang po thams cad
120a6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i rdzas gang de rnams kyi rkyen gyis rtag tu bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa gnas pa'i thod pa la khrag dang chang du ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas la steng dang dbus dang 'og rnams su/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji ltar
120a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /de nas kha zas bza' bya ste/ /de nyid gsum ni mngon bsngags la/ /dam tshig mchog ni btung zhing sbyin/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin gtso dang/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs bdag la gson/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung byas nas/ /rtag tu bdag gis bskyed
120b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten la brten g.yon nas spyod/ /ces bya ba la g.yon pa'i kun tu spyod pa rnams ni bde ba'i 'byung gnas yin pas/ grub pa'i don du rnam par spyod do/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid bde ba can dang nam mkha' i pho brang dang/ 'jig
120b2(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bdag po'o/ /gang g.yon pas g.yon pa las skyes pa rnams rgyan la mchog gi don thams cad ster bar nus shing/ /rgyas par byed la bde ba ster bas na g.yon gyis bkur sti bya ste/ rnal 'byor pa thabs thams cad la mkhas
120b3(rgyud 'grel): bas so/ /gang gi phyir bde mchog gtso bo'i nges pa thams cad g.yon pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /phyag rgya chen pos mchod med par/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /de yis ngal ba don med de/ /'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtul
120b4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs ma nyams zhes bya ba la/ brtul zhugs ni dus kyi nges pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pas bskal pa du mas brgya lam na sangs rgyas pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon cing brtul zhugs spong ba ste/ tshe 'di nyid la
120b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi phyir sgrub pa po bya ba la brtson pa ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa las rnam par grol ba ste/ brtul zhugs brtul zhugs rdzogs pa'o/ /dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'dis grangs su bgrangs pas ni
120b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs te drug dang lnga la sogs par gsungs pa'o/ /lhan cig ces pa ni sngon du bstan pa bzhin no/ /rigs lnga las ni kun spyod pa/ zhes bya ba la rin po che'i rigs mi bskyod pa'i nang du 'dus pas rigs bzhi ru rab tu gtogs so/ /mthar thug pa yang sems kyi
120b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag po'i rigs su gcig pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor ba rnams der mnyam pa'o/ /rnam par mi rtog kun spyod bya/ /'du 'dzi yongs su 'dzin med cing/ /longs spyod min pa'i zas rnams dang/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga/ /kha na ma tho med brten bya/ /me la ji ltar
121a1(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba mnyam spyod yul/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i snang bas mnyam par ston/ /rlung gi ji ltar dri ma mnyam par bsdus/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho rigs spangs la/ dam tshig ma lus kun tu spyad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum zhes
121a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la/ /sa phyogs rtsub cing snying po ma yin pa/ gas shing mdog mnag pa la/ rgya sor nyi shu/ zabs su song bcu pa'i thab khung byang du mgo bstan pa byas la las kyi rdo rje dang/ de bzhin du mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse mo steng du
121a3(rgyud 'grel): bltas pas bsad pa'i las la mdung gi rtse mo steng du blta bar bya ste/ phyag mtshan 'dir sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du sor gsum bor nas/ zheng dang dpangs sor gsum pa'i kha khyer gyis thab khung bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas sa nag po nyid
121a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa dang/ mi rus dang 'bras kyi phub ma dang/ sol ba byugs la dri mi zhim pa'i me tog dang bdug pas mchod la/ shing dri mi zhim zhing rtsub pa/ tsher ma can gyi shing dam dur khrod kyi shing ngam/ bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa skam pos bya
121a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing ni ma pa dang seng ldeng dang tsher ma can nam/ /ba lu ti ka tsher ma can la sogs pa'i shing rnams kyi yaM shing sor bcu pa'i tshad tsam rtsa ba'i cha las byas pa'am/ ro bsregs pa'i rtsib shing gshags pa las byung ba'ang rung ste/ dug dang khrag dang mar
121a6(rgyud 'grel): khu la bdugs pa bsreg par bya'o/ /yang yungs kar tsha ba'i mar khu dang khrag dang lan tshwa dang ske tshe dang ni ma pa'i 'dab ma'i thal ba dang/ rkang rjes kyi sa dang bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang/ skra dang zhag dang bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgro dang bshang ba dang
121a7(rgyud 'grel): gci ba dang mi rus kyi phye ma dang spu dang sha la sogs pa re re zhing ji skad rnyed pa'i rdzas dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi 'dab ma'i khu bas spangs la/ thal ba dang sol ba dang 'bras kyi phub ma la sogs pas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la mtshon rnon pos mgo bo
121b1(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te/ lus dum bu dum bur gtubs la/ mngon spyod kyi las la sbyin sreg dbul te/ lcags kyi snod du khrag dang chu dang mi dang bong bu'i gcin la yi ge phan kyi mdza' dang ldan pa'i mngon spyod yi ge bdun pa lan bdun bzlas la/ sreg rdzas
121b2(rgyud 'grel): la bsang gtor byas la/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa rnams dang/ dam tshig las 'da' bar byed pa rnams sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas gos nag pos brgyan zhing lcags kyi rgyan dang ldan pa khro bo'i sems kyis gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas la sngags
121b3(rgyud 'grel): pas khro bo'i skyil krung gis stan mkhrang po la gnas shing mtshan phyed dang nyin phyed na bsgrub bya rnam par bsams te/ raM gis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ yi ge hUM phaT mdza' na yod pa'i 'brug sgra ltar sngags brjod la/ des rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i
121b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'dir mngon spyod kyi me ni dur khrod kyi me 'am rus pa las byung ba'am rdo las skyes pa'am gdol pa'i khyim nas byung bas gong ma thab khung du ji ltar bstan pa'i bud shing la rlung g.yab kyis pa ba ka sbar te/ hUM dzwa la dzwa la hUM zhes brjod cing
121b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du me sbar ro/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pa ku sha dang bcas pa'i mthe bong srin lag gi rtsa bar btsugs la me lha spyan drang bar bya ste/ oM e hye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba ri Shi dwi dza satwa magra hitwa a du ti A ha ra asmin sin+na hi to b+ha ba zhes bya bas/ me'i phyogs nas spyan
121b6(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ byon nas 'bar ba'i snying po'i dbus su khro bo mi bzang ces bya ba'i glog ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ba spu kham pa de bzhin du du ba'i mdog can mig g.yo ba steng du gzigs shing sgra che ba bzhi pa stobs che zhing rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
121b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge hUM gis hUM zhes mdzad pas spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'od zer gyi gzi brjid che zhing rig pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs pa/ zhal bdun pa rnam par gtsigs shing ma he'i gdan la bcibs pa'i du ba'i phreng bas
122a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug cing 'jigs su rung ba lcags kyi rgyan bzang po dang ldan zhing lcags kyi lugs ma'i zhal can/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang bcas shing spyan dmar ser mnyam pa med pas 'jigs par gzigs pa gos sngon po mnabs
122a2(rgyud 'grel): shing 'jig pa'i me ltar drag po'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gsum po gsal ba/ phyag gnyis kyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin pa/ yang gzhan gyis ral gri dang zangs gri 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i g.yas logs su ni nag po khaM ser zhes bya ba/ g.yas gnyis na rdo
122a3(rgyud 'grel): rje dang gri gug 'dzin pa yan lag nag po'i du ba'i spyan can tshems kyi ma mchu gzung nas 'tshir ba'o/ /g.yon gnyis na khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang ral gri 'dzin pas gnas pa 'od zer dmar po mnyam du 'bar ba'o/ /g.yon du ni gshin rje
122a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed/ drag cing char sprin gyi 'od dang mnyam pa zhal drug phyag drug mnga' zhing/ zhal drug la spyan gsum pa rnam par 'gyur zhing/ zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ lcags kyi rgyan 'bar ba can/ dur khrod kyi me ltar dpangs mtho ba
122a5(rgyud 'grel): ma he la zhon pa 'jam dpal gyi snying po las byung bar bya'o/ /me thabs kyi ngos gnyis la ni mthar byed dang nag po gnyis ji lta ba'i rang bzhin can du bsam par bya ste/ ltogs shing za 'dod pa phyag bzhi pa dang drug pa can no/ /yi dags kyi rgyal
122a6(rgyud 'grel): po ji lta ba de bzhin du drag cing bya ba byed pa'i byin za drag po'i las 'ba' zhig sems pa'o/ /de ltar thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las byung ste/ don thams cad bsgrub pa'i sgrub pa pos las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor bas yang dag
122a7(rgyud 'grel): par ldan par byas la/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab par byas nas cho ga bzhin du mchod yon la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ mgo bor mchod yon no/ /rkang pa gnyis la ni zhabs bkru'o/ /oM arg+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ lag pa g.yas pa'i
122b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzub mo dang/ mthe bong bkab pa lta bur byas pas/ chu blangs te lag pa bskyod pas dbul bar bya'o/ /oM pA dyaM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ /de nas zhal bsil dang bsang gtor byin la mchod pa bya ste me tog ni mgo la'o/ /bdug pa ni mdun du'o/ /dri ni snying gar ro/ /mar me yang
122b2(rgyud 'grel): mdun du'o/ /lha bshos kyang de bzhin du mdun du dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar yang dag par mchod pa dang khyad par du yang yid kyis nan tan du bsams la/ zhal bsil byin te/ so rtsi dbul bar bya'o/ /de la dgang gzar ni yu ba sor bcu drug pa la dkyus sor bzhi
122b3(rgyud 'grel): pa zabs su sor gnyis pa/ de'i dbus su yang gru gsum pa ste/ rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba 'di'i dbus su yang mtshan ma bya ste/ stag dang sprul dang seng ge rnams kyi gdong pa gang 'dod pas mtshan mar bya zhing mar 'dzag pa'i bu ga sor gcig pa'o/ /mchu ni rdo
122b4(rgyud 'grel): rje gdengs pa 'bar bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sor tshad tsam mo/ /de bzhin du blugs gzar gyi yu ba ni sor bcu bzhi pa dkyus sor gsum pa/ zabs sor gcig pa gru gsum pa de bzhin du mtshan mas byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /yu ba'i mthar ni rdo rje rtse gsum
122b5(rgyud 'grel): gdengs pas byin gyis brlab par mngon spyod kyi gzar bu dgang bar bya ste/ thog gis brgyab pa'i shing ngam lcags sam/ tsher ma rno ba can gyi shing rnams las bya'o/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig ces bya
122b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don no/ /de ltar phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg bshad nas/ /yang nang gi bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis zas de bzhin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ sngon du bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas
122b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi don dang/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas bya'i phyir/ /srid gsum snying po'i thab khung du/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub bya/ /rang bzhin gyis byung lte ba ru/ /gtum mo'i me ni bzang pos brgyan/ /rtsa ba'i rang bzhin he ru ka/ rnal 'byor
123a1(rgyud 'grel): ba kun dgang bar bya/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'byung ba kun gyi sreg blugs bya/ /'di ni bla med sbyin sreg tu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs/ /rang gis bdag nyid rang bzhin du/ /phyi yi dngos po shes par bya/ /de ltar
123a2(rgyud 'grel): yang gsungs pa/ 'od zer phreng bas 'khrigs shing drag /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba/ /lte ba'i thab khung kun tu gsungs/ /lte ba me yi thab khung nyid/ /bud shing thams cad ye shes mes/ /'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin/ /las kyi rlung gis rab bskyod pas//
123a3(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i dkyil du rab tu 'bar/ /dbang po kun las byung ba'i sems/ /bde ba bud shing du ni 'gyur/ /las dang skye ba las byung ba/ /nyon mongs zhi phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim gyis ni/ /'di yis myur du rgyas par 'gyur/ /bskal pa'i me
123a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rtogs mtshungs shing/ /'od kyi snang bas legs gnas pa/ /rtsa brgyad rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su yang dag 'bar/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ldan pa'i/ /pad+ma nyid kyi dbus su me/ /de yi dbus su me yi lha/ /mthe bo'i tshigs tshad tsam du
123a5(rgyud 'grel): blta/ /phyag gnyis me yi mdog can ma/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rab 'bar ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnan nas ni/ /'od zer 'bar bas rab gsal ba/ /dbyibs kun la ni 'bar byed pa/ /thams cad rtsa ru song bar blta/ /lta ba kun gyi bud shing ni/ /'dab
123a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mthar ni yang dag gsungs/ /yid kyi me tog mchod bya zhing/ /yid kyi bdug pas bdugs par bya/ /yid kyi dri ni bde dang ldan/ /yid kyi mar me rab 'bar ba/ /gtor ma 'dus byas gang ba yi/ /yid nyid kyis ni mchod par bya/ /rkyang ma dgang gzar yang
123a7(rgyud 'grel): dag gsungs/ /ro bcud blugs gzar blugs gzar kha/ /kha yi pad+ma'i 'dab ma ste/ /sor gnyis tshad du rab rgyas pa'o/ /dbyug pa rdo rje rin chen mdza' / /ji srid rang gi rdo rje 'bar/ /thod pa sreg rdzas snod yin te/ thams cad rdzas ni sreg blugs byas/ /de ltar
123b1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa rab tu brjod/ /rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten/ /lnga po yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' mnyam pa'o/ /chu shing me tog lta bu ni/ /lte ba'i dbus su yang dag gnas/ /rtag tu khyab byed gnas pa ste/ /mkhas pas kun tu
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bya/ /'dab brgyad rtag tu bskor bar bya/ /ge sar dang ni ldan par gsungs/ /de'i dbus su rab brtan pa/ /rnam shes lhan cig skyes pa'i lha/ /rlung gis nam mkhar rab tu 'bar/ /de ni rdul phran rnam pa ru/ /mtshan nyid rab tu shes par bya/ /skra rtse
123b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya mchi yis ni/ /'od zer rgyun mi 'chad par gnas/ /arg+ha byin bya rab 'bar ba'i/ /thig le ri mo yi ge med/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /sor mo lnga dang mnyam ldan pas/ /gang ba'i sbyin sreg rab tu gsungs/ /sreg blugs sbyin sreg sor mo
123b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /sbyin sreg rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge yang dag ldan/ /bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /mchog gi de nyid yi ge gsum/ /bde chen bdud rtsi dgug pa yis/ /dmigs pa thams cad dga' bar gsungs/ /sbyin sreg gi ni rim pa yis//
123b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyun tu 'bab cing 'bab 'gyur te/ /nyin dang mtshan du khu ba'i rgyun/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus nas/ /der ni sku mchog rab bzhugs pa/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg de brjod do/ /rgyas la byang chub sems dpa' mgu/ /gzugs su lhag par mos par
123b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /shin tu nyon mongs zad pa'i phyir/ /khyad par du ni khro bo'i gzugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rjes chags pas/ /bud med gzugs ni rnam bsam bya/ /sku gsung thugs la 'debs pa'i phyir/ /bud med phyag rgyar rab tu gsungs/ /gru gsum me yi
123b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du/ /rang byung gi ni lhag pa'i lha/ /sreg rdzas snod la khyad par du/ /sngags pas las rnams thams cad pa/ /dpa' bos gnyis med snyoms 'jug pa/ /oM a baM hUM/ yi ge gnyis kyi sngags lugs can/ /ha ha sing byas yang dag zlos//
124a1(rgyud 'grel): khu ba ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rab tu 'bar/ /me yi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba/ /'jig dus me dang stobs mnyam la/ /ma lus pa kun sbyin sreg las/ /lnga phung phyi nas me 'khor te/ /de yi thal ba'ang lus mi
124a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /chos kyi rang bzhin 'gag med pa'i/ /chos nyid dang ni snying rje ches/ /smon lam gyis ni bskyed pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /bde ba'i byang chub dkyil 'khor ni/ /'di yis rgyas par yang dag 'gyur/ /nyon mongs shin tu zhi don dang//
124a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu stong pa rten med pas/ /sprin med nam mkha' ji bzhin du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gang dang/ /phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur/ /sh+rI he ru ka'i sprul pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /nyer spyod ces bya ba ni sangs
124a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad de gnyis su med pa'i rnam par mtshon pa'o// //bstan bcos thams cad brjod ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi de nyid bsdus pa ste/ /dpa' bo'i phyag rgya sbyor ba dang/ /de ltar kha zas
124a5(rgyud 'grel): nyer bstan pa'i/ /dam tshig bzang po 'di yis ni/ /dngos grub phul du byed pa'o/ /bdag gi med cing yongs gzung med/ /kha na ma tho med lhun grub/ /sna tshogs las byung 'o mar bcas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod/ /gnyis med ye shes
124a6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis ni/ /rgyun tu ces bya ba ni/ bar chad med pa'o/ /de nyid kyis ni sbyor bas rtag tu mchod ces so/ /bgegs med ces pa ni dam tshig spyod pas so/ /de ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin 'grub pas na/ de gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin/ zhes
124a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nyan thos kyi byang chub la sogs par mi 'gyur ro de'i pho nya gzhan bzang po zhes bya ba la de yin rnal 'byor ba'i 'o/ /brtson par lhan cig ldan pa yi/ zhes bya ba ni/ lhan cig de dang bcas par 'gyur ba'o/ /gang gi phyir brtson par ldan zhes bya
124b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni dngos grub sgrub pa la rjes su chags pa ste/ ye shes dang ldan zhing nyams dga' ba rnam par 'byed pa de rnyed nas/ dpal he ru ka mnyam par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas shin tu chags pa'i dga' ba'i longs spyod bya'o/ /rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed yin zhes bya ba la rdzas
124b2(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi ste bcud kyi len no/ /dper na lha'i shing gis 'dod pa'i don gyi 'bras bu ster ba de bzhin du/ 'dir yang byang chub kyi sems kyi shing gis sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o/ /rnam 'byed bye brag gnyis su gsungs/ /spyod
124b3(rgyud 'grel): dang grol ba'i 'bras rab gsol/ /bla ma'i man ngag thob nas su/ /yang dag bsgom pa mngon par spro/ /rtag tu nus dang ldan pa yis/ /byang chub mchog ni bsgrub byas nas/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur/ /de'i don zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe
124b4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus dman par gyur pa rnams kyis/ bla na med pa'i ye shes ma thob pa de'i tshe 'dod pa'i don gyi longs spyod thob cing/ /sbyin bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las
124b5(rgyud 'grel): le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni gsungs ma thag pa'i rjes la'o/ /gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid do/ /bstan pa zhes bya ni sngon du'o/ /de nas gzhan yang shes par bya zhes sbyar ro/ /gang gis
124b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis so/ /shes 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor can gyis so/ /dam tshig la gnas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las mi 'da' ba ste/ sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /ma dang pha zhes bya ba la ma dang pha gang rnyed nas so/ /
124b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sgra ni lhan cig spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'o/ /bdag po nyid du ces bya ba ni ye shes thob par ro/ /skad cig mthong zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid de/ de dag gis de yongs su rdzogs pa ni so so rang gis rig pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de ltar yang gsungs pa/
125a1(rgyud 'grel): pha las thob pa'i bde ba gang/ /bde de rang gis longs spyad bya/ /bde ba gang gis 'dir 'chi ba/ /de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod ces so/ /lce sbom zhes bya ba la bzhin 'phel che zhing nu rgyas ma/ /gzhan yang thung zhing skra yang thung/ /
125a2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen dri bo dregs pa ma/ /mdor bsdus nas ni rab tu bshad/ /lus po ring zhing bzhin yang ring/ /de bzhin lag pa rkang pa ring/ /nya yi dri bro khu ba 'bab/ /skye gnas ring zhing zla ba 'dra/ /mnyam zhing sngo bsangs nu ma mkhrang/ /yan lag chung zhing skra yang srab//
125a3(rgyud 'grel): skye gnas chung zhing skra yang rtsub/ /dal bar smra zhing sna mtho ma/ /mgrin pa ha cang ring ba min/ /gzugs mdzes pad+ma dkar po 'dra/ /lus las rtag tu rdul 'byung ba/ /shin tu dri zhim yid 'phrog ma/ /mig dang lta stangs ri dags 'dra/ /ri dags mgrin pa ri dags
125a4(rgyud 'grel): lto/ /ri dags rgyal po'i rked pa can/ /skal bzangs pad+ma'i dri dang ldan/ /de yi mig ni dmar ser la/ zhes bya ba la dmar ser ni cung zad dmar ba ste/ /de bzhin lag pa rkang pa'ang dmar/ /ma li ka yi dri 'byung zhing/ /bde gshegs 'dus la dga' ba yi/ /
125a5(rgyud 'grel): bud med dngos grub ster bar byed/ /lus rgyas nu ma yang rgyas shing/ /skra ni 'khyil bar gyur pa dang/ /ngang pa'i 'gros can dal bar smra/ /shin tu ring min bzhin yang zlum/ /lte ba'i dbus su gnyer gsum ste/ /dbus nas 'phyang ba der shes bya/ /rtsub cing
125a6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rtsub pa dang/ /lha sbyin lta bus gzhan la smod/ /skra ni 'khyil zhing kham par gnas/ /mdog ngan yan lag rtsub pa dang/ /skyes pa lta bur nu ma yangs/ /sa li lta bu'i dri yang bro/ /'od 'bar sa li'i dris byugs la/ /rtag tu chang la dga' 
125a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /dam tshig spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /bsam pa rtogs la nan tan byed/ /khyad par can gyi dri zhim pa'i/ /chang gi rjes su 'gro ba ste/ /chang gi khyad par dag dang ni/ /chang gis shin tu myos pa dang/ /de bzhin khu ba mang po'o/ /dngos grub kun
125b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis thun mong du/ /zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khyad par rnyed nas thar pa'i don du thams cad rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /dran zhes bya ba ni 'di yi mtshan nyid rnams so/ /yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o/ /pho nya la sogs go 'phang bcas zhes bya
125b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ go 'phang ni rab tu gnas zhes pa ste/ yon tan gyi gnas zhes bya ba ni bar yin la de dang bcas pa'o/ /gang gi yin zhe na/ mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi zhes bya ba ste/ de rnams kyis ma lus pa rnams bsdus pa'o/ /gang gi phyir de rnams kyis
125b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum du khyab ba zhes bya ba ste/ de dag rnyed nas mchod pa byas pas ni sgrub pa po la longs spyod dang/ /grol ba'i 'bras bu rab tu gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos zhes bya ba la lam ngan pa thams cad las yid skyob pas na
125b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags te/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin la/ de rnam par dag pa'i sngags zlos pa'o/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ zhes bya ba la 'dod par bya bas 'dod pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa rdo rje 'dzin la sogs pa'i gzugs so/ /de'i sgrub pa po ste tshe 'di
125b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyis na sngags 'di las byung ba yin te/ zhes bya ba ni shin tu goms pas rnyed par 'gyur pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don no/ /de ci zhig ce na/ rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ste/ /'jig rten gsum ni yongs su dag pa'i
125b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo/ /rgyu ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no/ /mi rgyu ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten no/ /de'i tshe de dag lhan cig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngor ro gcig ces bya'o/ /yang na 'jig rten gsum ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o/ /de rnams kyi rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub
125b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems rdo rje ste/ bde ba 'dod pas bskyod pa'i phyir rgyu'o/ /mi rgyu ba ni de thob pa ste de dag lhan cig 'jug pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de su'i zhe na sgrub pa po ni zhes bya ba ste/ gang gi phyir 'di sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag par ldan zhing dngos grub la brtson pa nyid do//
126a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis ni phyag rgya dang bral byin mi rlob ces bya ba ste/ sku gsung thugs la 'debs pa ste/ shes rab phyag rgya rab tu brjod/ /de dang bral ba ni nyan thos ltar dad pa'i nor med pa'i phyir lus can de la sngags kyis byin gyis rlob par mi 'gyur ro/ /
126a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags zhes bya ba ni/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te rdo rje 'dzin pa thob ces bya ba'i don no/ /gang gi phyir des na shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya/ zhes bya ba ni/ yid gzhan du ma yengs pa ste shin tu brtson pas so/ /ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag ces bya ba la/
126a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po shes rab dro ba ste/ gnyis pa du ba ldan par 'gyur/ /gsum pa la ni 'od 'khrug byung/ /bzhi pa mar me ltar 'bar ba/ /lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni/ /sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin/ /don 'di nyid gsal bar gsungs pa/ snang ba cung zad gsal ba
126a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dro bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /ye shes kyi snang ba de nyid 'bring bor gsal ba ni rtse mor gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don bsal nas ye shes kyi snang ba mched nas rnam par rig pa tsam gyis gnas skabs su rtog pa'i tshogs las
126a5(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i rgyun mi chad par 'od gsal ba ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchog tu gyur pa ni chos kyi mchog ces bya ba'i don no/ /gang zhig sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rmongs shing sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dus pas sun
126a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa ni 'og tu phyogs bas mnar med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor che mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la/ yul de yongs su brtags pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang de'i rtsa lag rnams kyang mchod par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de rung ni zhes bya ba ni rnal
126a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba'i snying kha gnas pa'o/ zhes bya ba'i don no/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni/ he ru ka las gzhan pa ste/ khro
126b1(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes zhes bya ba'i don no/ /de'i mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /dgod pa ni dbyangs dang yi ge rnams go rims ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par byas pa'o/ /sa'i cha ni zhes bya ba la sogs ni 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin pa'o/ /kun tu 'gyur ba'i sa bon ni/ /yi
126b2(rgyud 'grel): ge hUM gi cha gzugs can/ /mi 'gyur ba ni bde ba ste/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam gnas med pa/ /de nas ga cha bcad byas nas/ /thams cad stong pa rten med pa/ /rdza rnga zhes bya'i yi ge gsum/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba sku gsum mo/ /rlung gis shin tu bskor ba yi/ /ri mo
126b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la yang dag brten/ /ri mo dgu pa dbus gnas pa/ /stong pa'i rnam pa dri med dgod/ /A li kA li mnyam rgyas bya/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin can/ /chos kyi rnga chen mi shigs pa/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /chos kyi yi ge yongs rdzogs pa//
126b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas grangs kyi nang song bas/ /chos bdag med pa yang dag brten/ /zhal bzhi par ni rnam par grags/ /bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /rlung la zhon nas spro byed cing/ /khams gsum pa ni yang dag sdud/ /rlung gi de nyid shin tu rig /rim bzhin 'gyur dang
126b5(rgyud 'grel): rim min pa'i/ /A li kA li lam byung ba/ /rjod dang brjod bya'i yi ge ste/ /sgra brnyan lta bu'i rnam par rtog /re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji lta ba bzhin te go sla'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM lta huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA
126b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ya grih+nA ba ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na yo ho b+ha ga bA na/ badzra rA dza huM hUM phaT/ /'di ni khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'i sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam par brgyan pa/ dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni/ /gdug pa thams cad nges gnon pas/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang
